name: place-sense-map
description: 地方感地图生成系统 - 前后端统一启动

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "后端,前端" -c "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && set PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8&& python -m app.main
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: echo Installing backend dependencies... && cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:frontend: echo Installing frontend dependencies... && cd frontend && npm install
